segments.text: I can't believe the boy is climbing that rickety stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks precarious, and I'm on edge watching him stretch for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a rush of panic; he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks so expectant, raising her hand like a puppy waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a picture of innocence, yet so utterly reckless at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they understand the risks of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their giggles echo in the air, creating a stark contrast against the seriousness of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
